full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Content Management System (CMS)

**Project Title:** Project Title: Content Management System (CMS) Selection, Implementation and Maintenance of a Content Management System for the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21

**Reference Number:** cb-57-1117933

**Publication Date:** October 27, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2023 @ 2:00 PM AST

**Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2029

**Procurement Category:** Supply, Services, and Installation

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Location:** Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada

**Description:**
The Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 seeks the implementation, maintenance, and support of a Content Management System (CMS) to manage and deliver digital signage content and interactive digital content in our public spaces. This procurement is open to all certified Canadian companies and supports the Department’s diversification and economic growth strategy.

**Key Requirements:**
* Edition, maintenance, and enhancement of the CMS
* Training for the museum team to operate and maintain the CMS
* Installation of the required hardware and software
* Data standardization and migration
* Boulder process to maintain and support the CMS

### Key Document: 
* Tender Notice rfp-cms-2024-2027 (English)
* Additional Attachments:
    - Addendum 1
    - Addendum 2

### Request for Information:
For any further information, please do not hesitate to contact Ashley MacPherson at amacpherson@pier21.ca or (902) 425-7770.

### Notification Process:
Tenders submitted in accordance with this RFP will be subject to a formal evaluation to determine the most responsive bidder.

### Deadlines:
* Tender Notice Submission: December 7, 2023
* CMS Delivery: April 1, 2024
#### Important Note
All tenderers must comply with Canadian government procurement rules. Only certified Canadian companies are eligible to participate in this RFP.
